comment: Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.

methods.label: runTests
methods.comment: Main function to run tests. Must be overridden.
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomTester
  
Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Main function to run tests. Must be overridden.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Main function to run tests. Must be overridden.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomTester&lt;br /&gt;  &lt;br /&gt;Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()

methods.label: addTestSuite
methods.comment: Loads a TestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomTester
Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.signature: Function addTestSuite(testSuite As BaliTestSuite) As AbstractCustomTester
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Loads a TestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Loads a TestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomTester&lt;br /&gt;Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()

arguments.label: testSuite
arguments.comment: BaliTestSuite in which to record results
arguments.commenthtml: BaliTestSuite in which to record results
